1.name: Home Services
1.description: At Find You, we connect you with trusted, certified electricians who provide reliable services right at your doorstep. Whether it's installing new lighting, repairing electrical systems, or performing safety checks, our electricians are skilled professionals dedicated to ensuring quality and safety in every job. With Find You, finding the right electrician has never been easierâ€”simply connect with the best service providers in your area for quick and efficient solutions tailored to your needs.

2.name: Repair Maintenance
2.description: At Find You, we connect you with experienced car mechanics who can perform a range of services from oil changes to full engine repairs. Whether you need routine maintenance or urgent repairs, our mechanics are equipped with the tools and knowledge to get your vehicle back on the road quickly. Trust Find You for reliable, convenient car repair services at your location.

3.name: Automotive Services
3.description: At Find You, our certified plumbers are ready to tackle any plumbing issue you might face, from leaking pipes to full system installations. Whether it's a blocked drain, a burst pipe, or setting up new water systems, our professionals ensure top-notch service. With Find You, get quick, affordable, and high-quality plumbing solutions delivered right to your door.

4.name: Beauty Wellness
4.description: At Find You, our expert painters provide both interior and exterior painting services with a focus on precision and quality. Whether you're refreshing a room, adding a new color to your home, or tackling a commercial project, our painters ensure a flawless finish. With Find You, get in touch with professional painters who bring your vision to life with attention to detail and care.

5.name: Technology IT Services
5.description: Find You connects you with skilled carpenters who are experienced in everything from furniture building to custom cabinetry and home improvements. Whether you need a new shelf, a custom-built wardrobe, or structural repairs, our carpenters offer quality craftsmanship with every job. Trust Find You to help you bring your woodworking ideas to life.

6.name: Business Professional Services
6.description: At Find You, we connect you with professional gardeners who can help maintain your lawn, garden, and outdoor spaces. Whether you need garden design, landscaping, or routine lawn care, our gardeners are committed to providing personalized solutions that meet your needs. Let Find You connect you with local experts who keep your green spaces beautiful and healthy year-round.

7.name: Education Tutoring
7.description: An HVAC technician installs, maintains, and repairs heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.

8.name: Event Services
8.description: A mason builds structures from bricks, stones, concrete blocks, and other materials, such as walls, floors, and chimneys.
